infographic.description: 带文字标注的结构化信息图

mindmap.description: 中心辐射的概念关系图

concept.description: 抽象概念的可视化解释

flat_vector.prompt_zh: 扁平向量插画风格，清晰的轮廓线，明亮的纯色块，现代简约，无渐变
flat_vector.prompt_en: Flat vector illustration style with clean outlines, bright solid colors, modern and minimal, no gradients

isometric_3d.prompt_zh: 等距3D风格，轻微立体感，现代科技感，几何图形，柔和阴影
isometric_3d.prompt_en: Isometric 3D style with subtle depth, modern tech aesthetic, geometric shapes, soft shadows

hand_drawn.prompt_zh: 手绘插画风格，温暖亲切，略带手工质感，有机线条，自然配色
hand_drawn.prompt_en: Hand-drawn illustration style, warm and approachable, organic lines with handcrafted feel, natural colors

infographic_modern.prompt_zh: 现代信息图风格，数据可视化，图标化表达，清晰的视觉层级，专业商务感
infographic_modern.prompt_en: Modern infographic style, data visualization focus, iconographic elements, clear visual hierarchy, professional business feel

chalkboard.prompt_zh: 黑板风格，白色或彩色粉笔线条在深色背景，教育感，学术氛围，略带粉笔质感
chalkboard.prompt_en: Chalkboard style, white or colored chalk lines on dark background, educational academic atmosphere, subtle chalk texture

zh.hierarchical:
采用层级结构布局：
- 顶部居中放置主标题（大字醒目）
- 中部为核心内容区，从上到下按重要性排列
- 使用缩进或连接线表示从属关系
- 每个层级使用不同颜色或图标区分
- 主要分支3-5个，每个分支可有2-3个子项
zh.radial:
采用放射状/思维导图布局：
- 中心放置核心主题（圆形或椭圆形节点）
- 3-5个关键观点围绕中心均匀分布
- 使用连接线展示概念关联
- 可使用气泡或卡片形式呈现各观点
- 每个观点用不同颜色区分
zh.horizontal_flow:
采用水平流程布局：
- 从左到右的时间或逻辑顺序
- 使用箭头或连接线表示流向
- 每个节点包含图标和简短文字（4-6字）
- 突出关键节点或转折点（用不同颜色或大小）
- 节点之间保持均匀间距
zh.step_by_step:
采用步骤式布局：
- 清晰的数字编号（①②③ 或 1、2、3）
- 每步包含图标和简短说明（一句话）
- 步骤之间用箭头或虚线连接
- 可使用不同颜色区分步骤状态
- 纵向或横向排列均可，保持视觉流畅
zh.split_comparison:
采用分屏对比布局：
- 左右对称分布，中间有分隔线
- 相同维度对齐便于比较
- 左侧用一种颜色，右侧用另一种颜色
- 顶部标明对比对象名称
- 中间或底部可放置对比维度标签
zh.conversation:
采用对话式布局：
- 使用气泡或卡片呈现不同观点
- 可用不同颜色或位置区分发言者
- 突出金句或重要引用（加引号、放大）
- 整体呈现对话流程感
- 可加入小头像或图标代表发言者
zh.narrative_flow:
采用叙事流程布局：
- 按时间线或故事线从左到右或从上到下组织
- 关键事件节点用较大的卡片突出显示
- 可包含人物或场景小图标
- 使用连接线保持叙事的连贯性
- 时间标记清晰可见
zh.highlights:
采用亮点突出布局：
- 核心亮点居中或顶部，用大字体和醒目颜色
- 3-4个支撑信息环绕分布
- 使用大小和颜色区分重要性
- 整体视觉聚焦明确
- 可用图标辅助表达各亮点
zh.timeline_flow:
采用时间轴布局：
- 水平或垂直时间线贯穿全图
- 时间节点均匀分布在时间线上
- 每个节点包含时间和事件描述
- 可用不同颜色区分事件类型或重要程度
- 重要节点可放大或加粗显示
zh.flexible:
采用灵活自适应布局：
- 根据内容量自动调整布局结构
- 保持视觉平衡和美观
- 突出最重要的信息（放大、居中、醒目色）
- 留有适当的呼吸空间
- 信息分组清晰，易于快速浏览

en.hierarchical:
Use hierarchical structure layout:
- Main title centered at top (large, prominent)
- Core content area in middle, arranged top-to-bottom by importance
- Use indentation or connecting lines to show relationships
- Different colors or icons for each level
- 3-5 main branches, each with 2-3 sub-items
en.radial:
Use radial/mind map layout:
- Central core theme (circular or oval node)
- 3-5 key points distributed evenly around center
- Connecting lines showing concept relationships
- Use bubbles or cards for each point
- Different colors to distinguish each point
en.horizontal_flow:
Use horizontal flow layout:
- Left-to-right time or logical sequence
- Arrows or connecting lines to show direction
- Each node contains icon and short text (4-6 words)
- Highlight key nodes or turning points (different color or size)
- Maintain even spacing between nodes
en.step_by_step:
Use step-by-step layout:
- Clear numbered sequence
- Each step includes icon and brief description (one sentence)
- Steps connected by arrows or dashed lines
- Different colors to distinguish step status
- Can be vertical or horizontal, maintain visual flow
en.split_comparison:
Use split comparison layout:
- Left-right symmetrical distribution with dividing line
- Same dimensions aligned for easy comparison
- One color scheme for left side, another for right
- Object names labeled at top
- Comparison dimension labels in middle or bottom
en.conversation:
Use conversation-style layout:
- Speech bubbles or cards for different viewpoints
- Different colors or positions to distinguish speakers
- Highlight key quotes (quotation marks, enlarged)
- Show conversation flow overall
- Can add small avatars or icons for speakers
en.narrative_flow:
Use narrative flow layout:
- Organize left-to-right or top-to-bottom along timeline/storyline
- Key events highlighted with larger cards
- Can include character or scene icons
- Connecting lines maintain narrative continuity
- Time markers clearly visible
en.highlights:
Use highlights-focused layout:
- Core highlight centered or at top, large font and prominent color
- 3-4 supporting points distributed around
- Use size and color to distinguish importance
- Clear overall visual focus
- Icons can help express each highlight
en.timeline_flow:
Use timeline layout:
- Horizontal or vertical timeline running through the image
- Time nodes evenly distributed on timeline
- Each node contains time and event description
- Different colors for event types or importance levels
- Important nodes can be enlarged or bolded
en.flexible:
Use flexible adaptive layout:
- Automatically adjust structure based on content amount
- Maintain visual balance and aesthetics
- Highlight most important information (enlarged, centered, prominent color)
- Leave appropriate breathing space
- Clear information grouping for quick scanning
